Title: Certification and auditing process on the federation level to verify that TREs comply with requirements
Description: Establish a set of verifiable - auditable - key characteristics among participating institutions, including the EOSC-ENTRUST Blueprint, standards, ISO/IEC 27001 - Information Security Management, ISO/IEC 27701 -Privacy Information Management, etc. This requirement aims to ensure the limits of the word 'Trusted' in practice
